articles.title: NutriBullet Baby Steam + Blend: Save time and stress with this all-in-one baby food maker on sale
articles.author: Olivia Scott
articles.summary: The Nutribullet Baby Steam + Blend is an all-in-one kitchen appliance that combines the functions of a steamer, blender and food processor in one compact machine. It's currently on sale on Amazon Australia for $144, normally $179.

articles.title: Nice microphone to record my songs as I walk around?
articles.summary: My final product will be TikTok-type videos. I want to record myself singing the melodies of my songs while I handle puppets, walk around a little, etc. I will do enough takes to get a good sound recording. I would like to wear a little mic around my neck or a big mic around his neck.

articles.title: Beauty buffs swear doctor-approved blemish solution is a 'miracle' after seeing results
articles.author: Bethan Shufflebotham
articles.summary: Flawless Neutralising Gel from Dr Sam's has been hailed a'miracle product' for clearing up breakouts. Around 40% of adults struggle with blemish-prone skin, but most spot-related skincare products on the market are targeted at teens.

articles.title: I Found This Samsung Feature Accidentally and Now I Use It Every Day
articles.author: Ayush Jalan
articles.summary: On Samsung phones, you can open two apps simultaneously in a split-screen view or a pop-up window. You can adjust the size of pop-ups by dragging their corners. Samsung phones have a multitasking feature that is easy to use and comes in handy.

articles.title: Literally Just 26 Of The Coolest Products I've Seen Recently
articles.author: Katy Herman
articles.summary: Nyx Shine Loud liquid lipstick is an all-day liquid lipstick. Murad's Deep Relief salicylic acid acne treatment is a worth-the-splurge spot treatment for painful, deep zits. The conical cheese grater with a handle makes it easier to grate hard cheese. Sweet-support by rescue-support brand Sweet-dog earrings with colorful stones with stones go to the shelter.

articles.title: 27 Walmart Products That Are Pretty Much Perfect For Thirtysomethings
articles.author: Cierra Cowan
articles.summary: Some of the products were sent as samples by BuzzFeed and all were independently selected by our editors. They include a pet hair remover, Revlon Volumizer Hairdryer, an Instant Pot, internet box of internet pimple patches, and an air fryer.

articles.title: Tammy Nam joins AI-powered ad startup Creatopy as CEO
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Tammy H. Nam is the new CEO of Creatopy, a startup that uses AI to automate the creation of digital ads. Nam was COO and CMO at photo-editing startup PicsArt and CEO of video streamer Viki. Creatopy is looking for a US-based executive.

articles.title: The 5 smartphone AI features I use the most
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: Photo editing and audio mixing tools are some of his favorite AI features on phones. He also makes use of visual search and the more informative weather forecasts AI provides. He prefers text search most of the time. He takes advantage of date recognition to add items to Apple and Google's calendar apps.

articles.title: Newco's bid for Barloworld: engaging with PIC over governance and transformation concerns
articles.author: Philippa Larkin
articles.summary: Newco, a special purpose consortium, is intensifying efforts to drive its bid to acquire JSE-listed industrial giant Barloworld. Newco comprises Entsha Proprietary and Gulf Falcon Holding, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Zahid Group. The takeover saga began heating up in late 2024 when the Consortium, backed by Saudi-based Zahid and including Dominic Barela as a director, proposed a R23.10 per share scheme of arrangement. The PIC has publicly opposed the deal, citing governance concerns.

articles.title: Tammy Nam joins AI-powered ad startup Creatopy as CEO
articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.summary: Tammy H. Nam is the new CEO of Creatopy, a startup that uses AI to create digital ads. She is also joining the Creatopy board. The previous CEO Dan Oros has stepped into an advisory role. Customers include AstraZeneca, NASCAR, and The Economist.

articles.title: Manus AI revolutionizes technology with unprecedented autonomy in China
articles.author: Redação Mix Vale
articles.summary: Manus AI is an artificial intelligence agent developed by a Chinese team. It was launched last Wednesday, March 5th. It is capable of solving complex tasks without human intervention. It's a significant step in China's ambition to lead the AI market. It follows the success of DeepSeek, another Chinese AI agent launched in late 2024.

articles.title: Bengaluru woman's lazy water purifier hack is peak efficiency: 'Jugaadu designer'
articles.author: Muskaan Sharma
articles.summary: Ashita, a product designer from Bengaluru shared her ingenious solution to drain water from her new water purifier. Many praised her for being a "jugaadu designer" and called her attempt "brilliant" while others advised her on making her setup better.

articles.title: British airship pioneer Straightline Aviation plots flights to the Amazon and Arctic
articles.author: The Daily Telegraph
articles.summary: "It will be like a flying truck, which is what we want. We have a huge amount of end-user customer demand in a number of markets.   “We have a lot of interest in this product. ”

articles.title: Shoppers race to grab air fryer that's dupe of popular Ninja one and less than half the price
articles.author: Emily Mee
articles.summary: The Haden Stackable Air Fryer with Window 11L is being sold at The Range for £74.99, down from £149.99. It's 50% cheaper than the Ninja Double Stack XL 9.5L Air fryer from Aldi. Air fryers were the most popular kitchen gadget in the UK last year.

articles.title: 5 features I need in my next phone - starting with a faster, longer charge
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: There's still a lot of room for improvement in the smartphone industry. Many Apple Intelligence features are still missing in action, months after the launch of the iPhone 16. He wants to see 10x zoom, always-on display (AOD), better battery life and better wireless charging.

articles.title: 5 features I need in my next phone -- starting with a faster, longer charge
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: There's still a lot of room for improvement in the smartphone industry. People are willing to pay more for quality, but they can only pay so much for the quality. The Galaxy S25 Ultra supports 10x zoom, but only at "optical quality" so it's not the same as true optical zoom. The always-on display (AOD) can be a game changer for iPhone users.

articles.title: I tried the robot vacuum cleaner that mops floors and now I can't live without it
articles.author: Rachel Sloper
articles.summary: Ultenic T10 Lite robot vacuum cleaner is £80 cheaper than its larger T10 Pro sibling. It's easy to set up and map the house and has a mop feature. The app can be confusing to navigate and dust bags need replacing periodically. Shark's robot vacuum is another option favoured by consumers.

articles.title: A Great Idea Means Nothing Without the Right Market ' Here's How to Find It
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Building momentum without an existing user base is hard, but it has to be done if your business is going to succeed, as it's essential for it to succeed.      Â   i.e. it's necessary to have a customer base.

articles.title: 5 Reasons I Prefer Bixby to Google Assistant
articles.author: Bertel King
articles.summary: Bixby is a voice-activated assistant developed by Samsung. It works well with Samsung SmartThings, a smart home ecosystem. Bixby isn't as good at making conversation as Google Assistant or Gemini, but it's useful for some tasks. It's better to use Samsung apps than Google Assistant.

articles.title: Amazon slashes price of 'powerful' handheld vacuum cleaner
articles.author: Faye Preston
articles.summary: Powools Handheld Cordless Vacuum is on sale on Amazon for £32.99. Lakeland's Cordless Handheld Vacuum Cleaner is also on sale for £69.99, reduced from its usual price of £79.99 and Shark Classic Handheld Pet Vacuum for £59.99 as part of the brands spring sale.

articles.title: 'Beautiful and delicate' bedding set is easy way to freshen up your bedroom for £30 or less
articles.author: Joanne Ridout
articles.summary: The Dried Flowers Duvet Cover and Pillowcase Set is priced between £14 and £30. The set includes a pair of standard-sized pillowcases and is available as 100% cotton or easy-care polycotton. The Catherine Lansfield Floral Print White Bedding Set is available from Argos and from Marks & Spencer.

articles.title: iPhone 17 Air and Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge could get yet another ultra-thin rival
articles.author: Alan Martin
articles.summary: Leaker claims Honor is developing a'slim ultra-thin new machine' for a 6.3-inch small screen flagship. The company has already made a foldable phone, the Honor Magic V3, which was our Assistant Phones Editor's favorite handset of 2024.

articles.title: Man has 'genius' theory for finding best neighbourhoods when travelling
articles.author: Alice Sjoberg
articles.summary: An avid traveller has shared his go-to way to find the best areas in a new city. Will Watts uses Google Maps to look for Lululemon stores in the area. Nick shares his second method in case there are no Lullemon stores where you're going.

articles.title: Manus AI: China's Autonomous AI Agent Takes the World by Storm
articles.author: Itishree Sethy
articles.summary: Manus AI is a new AI model from Chinese startup Monica. It was launched just days ago and is already being compared to leading AI models from OpenAI and Google. It can create websites, plan trips and analyze stocks autonomously. It has real-time interaction with the environment and learns from user interactions to tailor its outputs to individual preferences. Monica has announced plans to open-source the model.

articles.title: Xbox's take over of PlayStation continues with Forza Horizon 5's Microsoft account requirement — but why?
articles.author: Jez Corden
articles.summary: Forza Horizon 5 has a Microsoft Account requirement on PlayStation 5. Microsoft's north star with its gaming operation is engagement above all right now, following Tencent's free-to-play heavy model. Forza Horizon 6 could launch on PS5, Xbox, and Windows PC.

articles.title: I saw the new Gemini and Project Astra, here's why it's the future
articles.summary: Project Astra is Google's new AI agent that is helpful in everyday tasks. The first two features are ready and will be available later this month. The big update to Gemini is the new Gemini Live, which gains new visual abilities powered by Project Astra. Google also showed off other new Gemini-powered features for products in its ecosystem.

articles.title: I saw the new Gemini and Project Astra, here's why it's the future
articles.author: Nirave Gondhia
articles.summary: Project Astra is Google's new AI agent that is helpful in everyday tasks. The first two features are ready and will be available later this month. The big update to Gemini is the new Gemini Live, which gains new visual abilities powered by Project Astra. Google also showed off other new Gemini-powered features for products in its ecosystem.

articles.title: After DeepSeek, Manus AI comes out of China: What is it and why is it making a buzz?
articles.summary: Chinese startup Monica developed a new AI agent called Manus. It was launched on March 6 and is already generating a lot of buzz in the tech world. According to its creators, Manus outperforms OpenAI's DeepResearch on the GAIA benchmark. It is available only as an invitation-only web-only preview.

articles.title: Who bought this smoked salmon? How 'AI agents' will change the internet (and shopping lists)
articles.author: Victoria Turk
articles.summary: Operator is a new AI "agent" from OpenAI. It has a similar text interface and conversational tone to ChatGPT, but it can actually do things. Anthropic introduced "computer use" capabilities to its Claude chatbot towards the end of last year. Perplexity and Google have also released "agentic" features into their AI assistants.

articles.title: NanoPhone, a miniaturized smartphone
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: The NanoPhone is on sale for $99.97 (reg. $199) during this limited-time sale. It looks like an iPhone, works like an Android and is about the size of a credit card. It does everything a regular smartphone can do in a fraction of the size and at a small price.

articles.title: The Ninja Swirl is even better and more fun than the original Creami
articles.author: Samantha Mangino
articles.summary: The Ninja Swirl lets you make soft serve at home. It's made for meal preppers and protein-maxxers. It isn't great for single servings or a crowd. It is still way too loud and even bigger than the previous Creami device.

articles.title: Who bought this smoked salmon? How ‘AI agents' will change the internet (and shopping lists)
articles.author: Victoria Turk
articles.summary: Operator is a new AI 'agent' from OpenAI. It has a similar text interface and conversational tone to ChatGPT, but it can actually do things, provided they involve navigating a web browser. It's early days and most commercially available agents come with a disclaimer that they're experimental.

articles.title: best smartphones for gaming
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Next week brings several exciting launches that could be worth your attention, if you're planning to buy a new smartphone, and next week is a good time to check them out. articles.author: Bébé Mélange
articles.summary: If you want meridian responses, you should look for unboxing and reaction videos or product reviews. If you want my body and you think I'm sexy, let me know. I referred to an inanimate object as crazy, in violation of my ableism policy.

articles.title: Tuft & Needle is revolutionizing bedtime routines with cool sleep tech
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Sleep Week 2025 runs from March 9 to March 15. Tuft & Needle has several sleep aid products designed to improve sleep quality. The T&N Kin mattress, available on Amazon, is designed to provide customized support and comfort. Loftie Smart Alarm Clock is packed with special features to help you wake up naturally.

articles.title: MTN launches Go M.A.D campaign in Ibadan
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: MTN Nigeria launched its Go Make A Difference (Go M.A.D) campaign in Ibadan to inspire Nigerians to take action for community development. Adebajo Onafowa, MTN Southwests Regional Manager for Customer Operations, spoke at the event on Saturday.

articles.title: 29 Cleaning Products Professionals Who Know Their Stuff Use Because They're *That* Effective
articles.author: Natalie Brown
articles.summary: 1. A carpet and upholstery stain remover. 2. A de-matting brush. 3. A solvent-based cleaner. 4. Purple Power De-Moisturizing De-Gustant.    For under $10, you can get it from Amazon.

articles.title: We aim to bridge talents, luxury brand representation gaps across sectors
articles.author: Pius Dukor
articles.summary: Kafilat Oladimeji Awotayo is the founder/creative director of Yellow Company, a creative marketing agency operating in Nigeria. Kafilat wants to act as a bridge for international luxury brands entering Nigeria, connecting them with local retailers and partners. She is launching an incubation programme called Creatives in Common, which helps corporate structures understand corporate culture.

articles.title: Next's 'gorgeous' £22 summer dress shoppers 'can't wait to start wearing'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Next has released a new easy-to-wear summer dress in three colourways. The Cotton Jersey Midi Summer Dress costs £22 and comes in black with white trim, cobalt blue with white trimmed, and coral and ecru stripes. The dress is a fairly new arrival on the Next website but it's already received a couple of positive reviews.

articles.title: Dry your bedsheets indoors fast with 1 bathroom item
articles.author: Katherine Mcphillips
articles.summary: Martin Seeley, CEO of MattressNextDay shares a quick-dry method to dry bed sheets indoors. The method uses a clean, dry towel and involves rolling it up tightly and placing it on a damp bed sheet. The towel absorbs most of the moisture from the sheet and helps evaporation when hanging it up to dry.

articles.title: Manus AI ‘Can Think And Work Independently': Built By Secretive Team, China's New AI Tool Stuns World After DeepSeek
articles.summary: Chinese tech firm launched Manus AI on Thursday. It claims to be the world's first autonomous AI agent. The demo video of the AI went viral in less than 20 hours after its launch. The team claims it beats 'open AI's Deep Research' AI on a popular test called GAIA.

articles.title: Ninja's five-star rated drinks gadget office goers 'absolutely love' reduced to £22 from £40
articles.author: Shawna Healey
articles.summary: The premium kitchenware brand offers the 530ml Ninja Blast Cordless Portable Blender. It's rechargeable via USB C and has a leakproof lid. It costs £22.32. New members of TopCashback need to sign up to claim the new member bonus.

articles.title: AI, platforms, health: Test your business creativity with Edition 178 of our weekly quiz!
articles.author: Your Story
articles.summary: The 178th quiz from YourStory tests your business acumen. Here are 5 questions to kick off this quiz.      .   "What do you know about business?" is one of the questions to start the quiz. "What are the other questions?" is the other one.

articles.title: Apple's First Foldable iPhone to Feature Book-Style Design & Cost Over $2,000 – Insights from Kuo
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Apple's first foldable iPhone is expected to be unveiled in late 2026 or early 2027. It will have a 7.8-inch inner screen and a 5.5-inch outer screen. The casing will be made of titanium alloy and stainless steel. It's expected to cost $2,000 and be aimed at the premium segment of the smartphone market.

articles.title: "Noise cancelling (ANC) is this good, but it's around 100,000 won?"This is what I thought as soon as..
articles.author: unwritten
articles.summary: LG Electronics has used its new product 'X Boom Buds' launched in January for a week. The price is 149,000 won (179 dollars). It is less than half the price of Apple's top-notch AirPods Pro 2nd Generation (349,000 Won or 89 dollars).

articles.title: Miss BLACKNIFICIENT Teen Pageant to celebrate natural beauty, empower young girls, says XCEPTIONAL Media
articles.author: Vanguard
articles.summary: XCEPTIONAL Media has announced the launch of the Miss BLACKNIFICIENT Teen Pageant. The pageant is dedicated to celebrating natural beauty, promoting self-confidence and equipping young girls with the skills to become future leaders. It is also aimed at empowering young girls.

articles.title: "Redefining what it means to create": CU Boulder alum aims to revolutionize sound design
articles.author: Olivia Doak
articles.summary: Isaiah Chavous and his cofounders have raised $1.8 million to fund their sound design startup company called Noctal. Noctal uses artificial intelligence to automate the sound design process for content creators and filmmakers. The investment firm Caruso Ventures invested the majority of the money.

articles.title: Fintech firm unveils N25m contest for entrepreneurs
articles.author: Punch
articles.summary: FunZ has unveiled an N25m entrepreneurship contest for young Nigerians to put their thinking ability to a test. The ultimate target of the contest is solving problems to earn money. Click here to read the full news article.      Â

articles.title: Google, Oppo, Moto and Honor are finally giving us the AI we deserve
articles.author: Nirave Gondhia
articles.summary: At MWC, Oppo, Honor, and Tecno revealed new AI-powered products. The most exciting part of the AI Summit was the reveal of real-time translation during phone calls. Google is pushing AI on smartphones forward for the hundreds of millions of users who use Gemini or other AI solutions. Smart Connect allows you to link a laptop, tablet, and phone together to open a range of new features.

articles.title: ‘I assume vodka': Expert warns customers about bartenders who don't ask questions when you order a martini
articles.author: Steve Ecker
articles.summary: HellQueen Cocktails' TikTok has over 471.3K views with over 16.8K likes. The main ingredients for a martini are liquor, olives, and dry vermouth. There are many variations to the cocktail, such as dirty, dry, wet, or made with vodka.

articles.title: I've found a £2.59 'best alternative' to Lenor's laundry beads and now my washing smells amazing
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Lenor Unstoppables In-Wash Scent booster costs £3.50 for 176g from Sainsbury's. Aldi Almat So Soft Laundry Scent Booster costs £2.59 for 275g, which works out to 94p per 100g.

articles.title: Starbucks Unveils Spring Menu with New Drinks and Food Across the U.S.
articles.author: Golden Gate Media
articles.summary: Starbucks is introducing a refreshed spring menu. The Iced cherry chai, Jalapeño Chicken Pocket and TRUFF hot sauce are highlights. Starbucks is rolling out Sunsera Blend Blonde Roast and exclusive Reserve drinks in Chicago, New York City, and Seattle.

articles.summary: The truth is obvious to people when they unbox their new hardware and it's obvious to them when they open the box. It's obvious that the hardware is not worth much. It is obvious that it's not worth a lot of money. It doesn't matter how it looks.

articles.title: AI will amplify India's workforce, not replace it
articles.author: Arundhati Bhattacharya
articles.summary: In the past two decades, AI has entered a golden age, reshaping how we live, work and think. India is the third most digitised country, and 12th at the level of individual users among G20 nations. Indian consumers want greater personalisation. Businesses will have to rapidly upskill their teams to deliver personalised customer service on the go.

articles.title: AI diet helping new-age companies run lean
articles.author: Swathi Moorthy
articles.summary: Shashank Agarwal is the founder of API.market, a marketplace for artificial intelligence (AI) model application programming interfaces, with 3,100 customers across the world. He is also building Noveum.ai, an evaluator of large language models for enterprise use. His team has grown from two people to three, and he is looking to hire three more engineers.

articles.title: 'I tried the new Kindle Scribe and it is perfect for avid readers'
articles.author: Rachel Sloper
articles.summary: Amazon's latest Kindle Scribe takes the reading experience to new heights with its eReader-cum-tablet features. It allows users to make notes and even sketch, capabilities not offered by the standard Kindle or Paperwhite model. It's the largest model in the Kindle family and has a larger 10.2-inch screen that's anti-glare.

articles.title: Discovering the Perfect Pocket-Sized Projector at MWC 2025: A Love Affair with Innovation!
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Anya Sharma is the Lead Product Designer at Aurzen, the company behind the Aurzen Zip projector. The current resolution is 720p, with plans for 1080p in the future. The Zip supports smartphone mirroring for Netflix. The company is working to integrate more streaming services within the next few months.

articles.title: Channel Your Inner Princess With These 28 Dreamy Spring Dresses
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: You don't need a crown or a title to dress like a princess. You can buy a mini dress, a flowy midi dress with puff sleeves, a ruffled hemline, a vintage-style button-down dress and a sleeveless fit and flare dress with an elegant sweetheart neckline.

articles.title: Zero Complaints: An Aspirational Goal That Leads To Excellence
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: The concept of zero complaints intrigues me. At times you may create a perfect experience for your customer, but it won't happen every time and it's not always possible to create the perfect experience all the time, as the author points out. It's not possible to be perfect every time.

articles.summary: Aldi has brought back a popular lip oil. The product is cheaper than Charlotte Tilbury's lip oil, which costs $28.   Shoppers previously compared the lip oil to a $28 Charlotte Tilbur's product at Aldi.

articles.title: HOME COUNTRY: Prit-Nr Prawns and other delicacies from the sea
articles.author: Slim Randles
articles.summary: Willoughby visits the Soup 'R Market once a month. He has new things to sell each time. He sells simulated swordfish steaks, slightly sea bass, faux flounder, kinda crab and Scarcely Scallops. Slim Randles' granddaughter painted the cover illustration for the novella, Whimsy Castle.
